prompt: You are an experienced writer and researcher. Please help me revise my draft of an academic paper. I will send you a paragraph of LaTeX text (in <input></input>), and please make the LaTeX text grammatically correct, easy to read, and formal. The style should be appropriate for academic research papers. Please use active voice. Please do not add new content. Keep the text in a similar length. Please do not add new content.Put the revised text in XML format in the <output></output> tag. <input>{{text}}</input>
description: A general prompt to help researchers improve their writing.
title: Improve Academic Writing
